entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws random errors running in parallel on 64-bit .NET Core 3.1 or .NET 6 runtime on Windows 7 #66272
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'type == genActualType(type)' during 'Morph - Global' #66269
  • [Feature Request] Add xml serialization support for immutable arrays #66264
  • DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts=/mypath/myfile.socket does not work #66263
  • [API Proposal]: `HttpPostJson<TRequest, TResponse>`/`HttpPutJson<TRequest, TResponse>`/`HttpPatchJson<TRequest, TResponse>` extensions #66262
  • [API Proposal]: Enum.HasFlag<TEnum>(TEnum flag) #66261
  • about httpclient #66258

Closed

  • Queryable.Where causing performance issue in .NET 6 #66076
  • superpmi: add Extensions page to superpmi-replay pipeline to surface failures #66067
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not create small constants while morphing cascading addition #66270
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_I/OP_RCONV_TO_I from the back ends, co… #66268
  • Issue 62532 config binding #66267
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Do not mark implicit byrefs with GTF_GLOB_REF #66266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop collecting disposables if changed token encountered #66265
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Cloning improvements #66257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Try to remove "-" and "'" from HighCharTable #66200
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary return #66252
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #66259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add OSR patchpoint strategy, inhibit tail duplication #66208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1647296 #66130
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Remove SkipVerification support from the runtime #66211
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use RegexGenerator in applicable tests #66179
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize movzx after setcc #66245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing regex position check after BOL optimization #66216
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix address exposure in forward sub (x86) #66253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend Equals/StartsWith auto-vectorization for OrdinalIgnoreCase #66095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use the name of the header when throwing exception for invalid chars #66250
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove compiler warning suppression #66234
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix catching of generic exception in crossgened shared generic code #66207
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #66225
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #66230
    area-Microsoft.Win32, 6.0.x
